mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_product (account_id, product_name, limit_pay_fee_rate, limit_withdraw_fee_rate, merchant_withdraw_type, dealer_balance_type, type, status )VALUES( #{accountId}, #{productName}, #{limitPayFeeRate}, #{limitWithdrawFeeRate}, #{merchantWithdrawType}, #{dealerBalanceType}, #{type}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_product SET account_id = #{accountId}, product_name = #{productName}, limit_pay_fee_rate = #{limitPayFeeRate}, limit_withdraw_fee_rate = #{limitWithdrawFeeRate}, merchant_withdraw_type = #{merchantWithdrawType}, dealer_balance_type = #{dealerBalanceType}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_product WHERE id = #{id} AND status = 2
